mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NM, NICKNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, EMAIL, PHONE, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNm}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET USER_PW=#{userPw}, USER_NM=#{userNm}, NICKNAME=#{nickname}, BIRTHDAY=#{birthday}, GENDER=#{gender}, EMAIL=#{email}, PHONE=#{phone}, UPDATE_DATE=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.select: /* selectUser userMapper.xml */ SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_PW AS userPw, USER_NM AS userNm, NICKNAME AS nickname, BIRTHDAY AS birthday, GENDER AS gender, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM USER WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID=#{userId} AND USER_PW=#{userPw} AND USE_YN=#{useYn}
